title: My Lol Client won't open
body: **So the game was working perfectly fine till it was updating since the new patch came out as it was updating it stopped so I tried reinstalling lol but now its taking so long to download and when it downloads it wont open up it just goes to the lol logo then the logo disappears I tried reinstalling it like 5 times someone help me please :(**

replies.body: Your operating system needs to allow the patcher to launch.  In your specific issue, it sounds like it's being blocked due to a permissions issue.  I recommend using our [Permissions ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)guide to troubleshoot this.  I suggest trying to Run as Administrator as the first step for your issue.
